Condition_summary_1: development of an operating plan for the Timiskaming Dam to protect fish spawning habitats
Condition_summary_2: monitoring and reporting requirements including annual reports on dam operations, fish recruitment, and contingency measures
Condition_summary_3: implementation of adaptive management strategies if deviations from the operating plan impact spawning success
Condition_summary_4: compliance with Species at Risk Act and prohibition on depositing deleterious substances
Habitat_Type: spawning habitats for Lake Sturgeon and Lake Whitefish
